com.netflix.spectator.api

Class CompositeRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.spectator.api.CompositeRegistry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Registry, Iterable<Meter>

    public final class CompositeRegistry
extends Object
implements Registry
    Maps calls to zero or more sub-registries. If zero then it will act similar to the noop registry. Otherwise activity will be sent to all registries that are part of the composite.
